nl.BobbinWork.diagram.math
Class NearestPoint

java.lang.Object
  nl.BobbinWork.diagram.math.NearestPoint

public class NearestPoint
extends java.lang.Object

Calculates the nearest point on a straight line or on a cubic bezier curve. Calculations for the Bezier parts come from: "Solving the Nearest Point-on-Curve Problem" and "A Bezier Curve-Based Root-Finder" by Philip J. Schneider from "Graphics Gems", Academic Press, 1990.

Author:

onCurve

public static double onCurve(java.awt.geom.CubicCurve2D c,
                             java.awt.geom.Point2D pa,
                             java.awt.geom.Point2D pn)
Return the nearest point (pn) on cubic Bezier curve c nearest to point pa.

Parameters:
c - cubic curve
pa - arbitrary point
pn - nearest point found (return param)
Returns:
distance squared between pa and nearest point (pn)
